cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on July 28, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4682, UAS Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 130 (Monday, July 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GUEST:
H.R. 4682.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H3908]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: UAS Act
